thread.title: Jorge Sampaoli puts Arsenal and Barcelona on red alert as he delays contract talks with Sevilla
thread.title_full: Jorge Sampaoli puts Arsenal and Barcelona on red alert as he delays contract talks with Sevilla

author: leeastley
title: Jorge Sampaoli puts Arsenal and Barcelona on red alert as he delays contract talks with Sevilla
text:
Jorge dropping Jorge Sampaoli puts Arsenal and Barcelona on red alert as he delays contract talks with Sevilla 
The former Chile boss has become one of the most sought after managers in the world after leading Sevilla to third in La Liga By LEE ASTLEY Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments SEVILLA boss Jorge Sampaoli has put Arsenal and Barcelona on red alert after he revealed he has delayed new contract talks. 
Sampaoli, 56, has become one of the most sought after managers in the world after taking over at the Spanish club and leading them to third in La Liga. Getty Images Arsenal and Barcelona target Jorge Sampaoli ha delayed contract talks with Sevilla Sutton United 0-2 Arsenal : Sutton’s magical FA Cup run is ended in gritty encounter 
And the former Chile boss has given the Gunners and Barca hope in snapping him up after he revealed he would not discuss a new contract until the summer. 
Sampaoli said: "We appreciate that they are trying to renew our contracts but to do that while we are in the present is very difficult. 
"We only want to live in the moment. 
"The way we work is like this and there are many reasons to appreciate the present. Alamy 3 Arsene Wenger will decide at the end of the season whether he will stay on as Arsenal boss 
"This is the most important game for Sevilla, we want to be one of the best eight teams in Europe and that’s more important than thinking about the future." 
But Arsenal could also try and bring Sampaoli to the Emirates if Arsene Wenger decides to not renew his contract at the club. related stories PREVIEW Saint-Etienne vs Manchester United: What TV channel is the Europa League tie on and when is it? Ozil sidelined Arsenal midfielder Mesut Ozil currently carrying a back injury but should be fit for Liverpool clash MIDWEEK MADNESS Why are Man United playing their Europa League tie against Saint Etienne on a Wednesday?
